---
title: Parameterized Reporting with Quarto
author: "Jadey Ryan"
date: last modified
format: html
params:
  sex: female
  eye_color: black
---

```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse) 
view(starwars)
```

```{r}
starwars |> 
  filter(sex == params$sex, eye_color == params$eye_color) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = height, y = mass)) +
  geom_point() 
```
